description: Warm little bar rooms, reminiscent of the German wine bars or "Stube", a summer terrace and well - prepared regional dishes: for those who want to escape the mundane life of Cortina for the silence of an isolated "baita" [mountain hut]. Delightful rooms, colourfully furnished in warm tones so you can better enjoy the silence and scents of the mountains.
facilitiesServices: Car park, Garden or park, Great view, Interesting wine list, Terrace
